Author: so_crat_ic
Text: Remember weight loss is a marathon, not a sprint. Ive only had coffee today. but next meal is. agiant bowl of brussel sprouts. If you dont respect your body, it wont be around or strong when you need it.   Everyone likes to argue about what someone "deserves". I say, who cares. Be healthy. You cant do anything good without health. And that comes from respecting your body's needs.
